solution_line_template: Claire's age now is {claire_age_in_2_years} - {years_until_20} = <<{claire_age_in_2_years}-{years_until_20}={claire_current_age}>>{claire_current_age} years old.

Being {jessica_older_by} years older than Claire, Jessica is {claire_current_age} + {jessica_older_by} = <<{jessica_older_by}+{claire_current_age}={jessica_current_age}>>{jessica_current_age} years old.
